alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Carteret; Craven; Jones; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 1:23PM EDT until June 22 at 2:30PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Newport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jones County in eastern North Carolina... Central Craven County in eastern North Carolina... Southeastern Beaufort County in eastern North Carolina... West central Carteret County in eastern North Carolina... Pamlico County in eastern North Carolina... * Until 230 PM EDT. * At 123 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Jasper to near Catfish Lake to near Kuhns, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Blounts Creek, Askins, Cayton, Lowland, Florence, Tuscarora, Rhems, Janeiro, Edward, Grantsboro, Royal, Cox Crossroads, Bonnerton, Riverdale and Olympia. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
